title: Locked Out Of Heaven - Bruno Mars
lyrics: Oh yeah yeah Never had much faith in love or miracles Never wanna put my heart on the line I'm swimming in your world is something spiritual I'm born again every time you spend the night Cause your sex takes me to paradise Yeah your sex takes me to paradise And it shows, yeah, yeah, yeah Cause you make feel like, I've been locked out of heaven For too long, for too long Yeah you make feel like, I've been locked out of heaven For too long, for too long Open up your gates cause I can't wait to see the light Cause you make feel like, I've been locked out of heaven Yeah you make feel like, I've been locked out of heaven Oh oh oh oh, yeah, yeah, yeah Can I just stay here Spend the rest of my days here Oh oh oh oh, yeah, yeah, yeah Can't I just stay here Spend the rest of my days here Cause you make feel like, I've been locked out of heaven For too long, for too long Yeah you make feel like, I've been locked out of heaven
